name: Busy Bee
description: '''David James Parker''' (born October 26, 1962), known by the stage name '''Busy Bee''', is an American [[old school hip hop|old-school hip hop]] musician from [[New York City|New York, NY]]. First coming on the New York City music scene in 1977, Busy Bee worked with many of hip-hop's founding fathers, including [[Melle Mel]], [[Disco King Mario]], [[Afrika Bambaataa]], and Kool DJ AJ.
